## Accessing Spatial data from R

- [Web Map Services (WMS)](https://www.ogc.org/standards/wms/): data in raster format e.g. images (e.g. .tif)
- [Web Map Tile Service(WMTS)](https://www.ogc.org/standards/wmts/) : same as WMS raster but images are precalculated as tile
- [Web Feature Service (WFS)](https://www.ogc.org/standards/wfs/) : data in vector format (e.g. .shp).
